claim: Cell- and egg-based flu vaccines have the potential to develop mutations during production, which may reduce their effectiveness.
explanation: A black-and-white image displaying the U.S. Department of Health & Human Services seal on the left and the CDC logo on the right against a black background. The image contains only organizational logos and no information about vaccine production, mutations, or effectiveness, so it does not support the claim. Note: Analysis limited by the fact that the image only shows logos and no textual or data content related to the claim.
